mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ct_freightbl (ufreightblid, ucustomerid, ublno, upurchaser, usupplier, utradedate, upurchasingarea, usupplyarea, uproductdesc, uweight, unumber, utotalamount, uprice, ubxunit, ushipmentport, upurchaseport, ushippingtype, ucreatedate )VALUES (#{ufreightblid}, #{ucustomerid}, #{ublno}, #{upurchaser}, #{usupplier}, #{utradedate}, #{upurchasingarea}, #{usupplyarea}, #{uproductdesc}, #{uweight}, #{unumber}, #{utotalamount}, #{uprice}, #{ubxunit}, #{ushipmentport}, #{upurchaseport}, #{ushippingtype}, #{ucreatedate})
